title: Wasnt allowed to ban in champion select???

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I queued up for a solo/duo queue match right after the new patch comes live, after one ban its my turn i try to ban lux and the "ban" is greyed out I still tried to press it with no success I spammed it still nothing. I chose other random bans and same thing happened, Kept me in the lobby after my banning phase was over for about 10 seconds I received a Error (I cant recall what specifically it said) and lost a game in my promos for this.


Update: lost my promos :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Has this issue occurred since? usually this is related to a connectivity problem. Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for me, let me know if this helps.
